Document:
# NCWL New Frontiers Program
Thank you for signing up for the New Frontiers Program!
After countless hours of research and number crunching, the top NCWL insurance agents have found it more profitable to offload the logistics cost on to you! Our dedicated citizens!
## Profit Avenues
You can access your personal bank account at any time to withdraw or deposit funds at any [color=#44cc00]State Bank ATM[/color]
Join a ship's crew to help make as much money and deliver as much value to the Union as possible, or use the [color=#cccc00]Shipyard Console[/color] to purchase your own.
## Provisions
NCWL has opened up back stock of many machine boards taken from excess station construction projects, along with many other amenities to assist in taming the frontier.
Frontier stations typically run longer shifts, so if you need to end early or take a break for a while, you can always return to a [color=##33bbff]Cryopod[/color] early.
